mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news(newsno, memberno, classifyno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate, newsgenre) VALUES(news_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{classifyno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate, #{newsgenre})
mapper.select: SELECT newsgenre, newsno, memberno, classifyno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate FROM news WHERE newsgenre = #{newsgenre}; ORDER BY newsno DESC

SELECT newsno, memberno, classifyno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, mp3 FROM news
ORDER BY newsno DESC
SELECT newsno, memberno, classifyno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, LOWER(file1) as file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, mp3 FROM news WHERE classifyno = #{classifyno} ORDER BY newsno DESC
SELECT newsno, memberno, classifyno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM news WHERE newsno = #{newsno}
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET map=#{map} WHERE newsno=#{newsno}
UPDATE news SET youtube=#{youtube} WHERE newsno=#{newsno}
mapper.select:
SELECT newsno, memberno, classifyno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM news
WHERE classifyno=#{classifyno}
WHERE classifyno=#{classifyno} AND (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY newsno DESC
